Title: Onan

Actors: Ramar Ramamoorthy, David W. Williams, Kaamatchinaadhan, Kabirdas Madhavan
Plot: Chopper, an Australian drug dealer arrives in Chennai looking to make a 'purchase'. He befriends Charlie, a local tourist guide who arranges to supply the 'stuff'. He also 'cultivates' a ...
